body.content:
Hello dear Sir,

Thanks for your email; even though I know both of us never met before,
you know in life it takes trust to achieve something sometimes. Like I
explained to you in my first email; my name is Joyce Behiri, I'm
21years old, and I am currently residing here in my country Cote
D’Ivoire (Ivory Coast), West Africa. Please, I want this matter to be
a top secret, I don't want anybody from my country here, no matter who
the person maybe to know about this matter. Please, I pray you respect
my opinion and decision.

I contacted you because I want you to stand as my guardian and foreign
trustee so that the bank here where my inheritance of $4,700,000.00
(Four Million Seven Hundred Thousand USD) currently deposited in a
bank be released and transferred to your account and you'll help me to
relocate to your country for onward investment of the money and to
continue my study under your care.

As things are at the moment, I don't have any body I can trust here,
not even from my father's side, because my uncles are also among the
people that my step mother is using to fight against me over my late
father's wealth.

Throwing more light about my decision to contact a total stranger. I
would like you to read this email carefully it will help you to have
proper understanding about this matter and know why I need your help.
It's true that I have money in the bank but I am suffering here and
can't even feed well just because of the agreement entered between my
late father and the bank when the money was deposited "that in case of
death or event the money should be released to me who is listed as the
next of kin / beneficiary once I fulfill the below instructions"

1, I have to present to the Bank my Guardian
2, My Guardian must not come from the same country
3, the money must be released to my Guardian.
4, Or I wait til when I'm 30yrs old

It was based on the above agreement between my late father and the
bank that made me to contact you to represent me before the bank as my
Guardian / Foreign Trustee so that the bank can release and transfer
the money to you as my Guardian and foreign beneficiary. After the
successful transfer of the money to your country, you'll then help me
to relocate to your country for the onward investment of the money,
and I will continue my life and education under your care. I shall
forward to you the official Deposit certificate of the money that was
issued to my late father by the bank when he deposited the money in my
next email, as that will enable you to be sure about my claim and
will be able to negotiate the release and transfer of the money with
the bank.


After much consideration for your willingness to help me I have
decided to let you have 20% of the total money; while the remaining
80% will be for proper investment in your country. I have also decided
that you will be the principal director of all the investments while I
complete my studies under your care.

Please, send to me

1, Your complete names
2, Complete home or office address
3, Occupation
4, Direct phone number.

As soon as I receive your reply I will then forward to you the contact
details of the bank with the deposit certificate so that you can
contact them to negotiate the release and transfer of the money.

With love from,

Joyce Behiri
